name: Ring Escape
description:
Let's play amazing Ring Escape game. It's amazing addictive game for all ages. Fit the ring on the dot and match the three rings.

It's amazing endless game. Challenge your friends.

Features:
=======
- Easy to play.
- Addictive game play.
- Colourful graphics.
- Mind exercise.
- Challenge your friends.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for beat me?

Download Now...
